system.description:
Stamina represents your endurance and resilience to physical strain or environmental hazards. It is tested in situations like prolonged exertion, resisting poisons, or enduring harsh weather conditions.

You make a Stamina test when facing challenges that test your physical endurance or resistance to fatigue.

Extra Successes Can Be Used To:

  • Endure Hardship – Persist through physical challenges like long marches or extreme weather.
  • Resist Toxins – Defend against poisons, venoms, or other harmful substances.
  • Recover Quickly – Shorten recovery times from injuries or exhaustion.
  • Sustain Physical Effort – Maintain performance during extended physical activities.
  • Survive Harsh Environments – Endure extreme cold, heat, or other environmental hazards.
